question: The World's highest railway bridge is coming up in _________.
explanation: The World's highest railway bridge which will be 35 metres taller than the Eiffel Tower is to come up over the Chenab River in Jammu and Kashmir at a cost of around Rs. 1,100 crore. The bridge will be of an arch-shaped structure in hostile terrain. It will be constructed using over 24,000 tonnes of steel.
